Name: Amber Tail Adventure
About the game: Nobody: Literally nobody: Me: HEY! WANNA ASS-BLOWING DARK SOULS BULLET-HELL TOP-DOWN PUZZLE?! - TAKE THIS!!! There's only You, the brave Sergio Fox, the parcel and the destination point! Everything else musn't bother you, especially: 30 mind blowing levels! More than 32 bloody enemy types!! 3, Hard as a Rock, Bosses!!! It's to dangerous to go alone! Take these: Speed up - Boosts your speed Vigilance- To see the bullet's traces Slow Mo - Slows the time down Switch off - Turns off all the turrets
